entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Placentia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:00 PM NST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 21 January 2023
